page.title: 08WORK OPTIONS NEAR WIDEGATES.
page.content: The Plymouth naval dock yard has 15,000 people working there. A number of them come from our area. There are some farming jobs available. The majority of other jobs are linked very much with tourism. Gift shops,restaurants,pubs,holiday cottages and hotels do a very good trade during the months of April,May, June, July,August and September.The other six monthes are different because they are quieter and the above enterprises lose custom, and have to survive on local trade which is often difficult. Mrs.Preston was the organist at Widegates Methodist Church until she died last year now Mrs Wills plays the organ.Mrs Day ran the Sunday School until Christmas.No one has been found to take it over.
